Package spaces.magenta_spaces

Class BuyAHouse

java.lang.Object
spaces.ColoredSpace
spaces.MagentaSpace
spaces.magenta_spaces.BuyAHouse
public class BuyAHouse
extends MagentaSpace
Class implementing a buy a house space.

Players on a buy a house space choose a house card from the cards available in the house card deck.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BuyAHouse​(int index, int nextIndex)
    Creates a buy a house space object

  • Method Summary

    void execute​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<HouseCard> houseCards, HouseCardDeck d, int index, Bank b)
    Executes the action associated with this space; that is, the player chooses a house card from the house card deck

  • Constructor Details

    • BuyAHouse

      public BuyAHouse​(int index, int nextIndex)
      Creates a buy a house space object

      In particular, a buy a house space has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is assigned as "Buy A House".
      • Its index on the board is assigned the passed parameter index.
      • Its next index is assigned the passed parameter nextIndex.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the space on the board
      nextIndex - the index of the next space the player can move to from this space

  • Method Details

    • getHouseCards

      public java.util.ArrayList<HouseCard> getHouseCards​(Player currPlayer, HouseCardDeck d)
      Returns the house cards a player can choose from

      On a buy a house space, a player chooses a house to purchase from the remaining house cards in the deck.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      d - HouseCardDeck object of the game
      Returns:
      the house cards a player can choose from

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<HouseCard> houseCards, HouseCardDeck d, int index, Bank b)
      Executes the action associated with this space; that is, the player chooses a house card from the house card deck

      On a buy a house space, the player chooses a house to buy among the available house cards in the deck.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      houseCards - list of house cards the player can choose from
      d - HouseCardDeck object of the game
      index - index of the chosen house card in the passed array list
      b - Bank object of the game

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
      Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a buy a house space

      In particular, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name], you are on a Buy A House space. Choose a house to buy from the available options."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class MagentaSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a buy a house space
